short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your focus with Quiet Facebook - blocks feeds and stories instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity and eliminate distractions on Facebook with ‘Quiet Facebook: Disable Feed & Stories’, an essential Chrome extension for anyone looking to reclaim their focus and time online. By seamlessly blocking news feeds and stories, this powerful tool transforms your Facebook experience, allowing you to concentrate on what truly matters.


Perfect for professionals, students, or anyone seeking a more mindful approach to social media, ‘Quiet Facebook’ offers a simple yet effective solution to the common problem of digital distraction. With just a few clicks, you can enjoy a cleaner, more peaceful Facebook interface, free from the noise and clutter of endless updates.

Features and Benefits:

Instant Feed and Story Blocking: Say goodbye to the temptation of scrolling through Facebook feeds and stories.

Customizable Experience: Easily adjust settings to fit your specific needs and preferences.
User-Friendly Design: Navigate the extension effortlessly, thanks to its intuitive layout.

Regular Updates: Stay ahead of Facebook changes with automatic updates for the extension.

Whether you’re aiming to improve your concentration, reduce time wasted on social media, or foster a healthier online environment, ‘Quiet Facebook: Disable Feed & Stories’ is your go-to solution. Install today and join thousands of users who’ve transformed their Facebook experience into a productive and distraction-free zone.
